Baby Belly Art Worx

What is a belly cast?

A cast taken of your pregnant belly and then transformed into a one-of-a-kind piece of art with very soft fairy lighting that you can hang on your babies bedroom wall.
Step 1

A cast is taken after week 33 to get the best belly shape

Step 2

We come up with a design that's perfect for you

Step 3

Your cast is attached to the design

Step 4

Your memory is finished or something

Some Previous Creations

Additional Services

Possibly some text here

Baby Showers

This is the perfect gift to give at a baby shower.

Already have a cast?

If you already have a cast, possibly from a DIY cast kit, it can still be turned into a fantastic design.

Cast-less Art

If you don't wish to have a design that contains a cast we're still to work together to create a piece of art to lighten up a room.

What to do next

Fill in your details below and I will contact you and we can discuss your ideas and get you booked in for your own creation.
